RelatedSentence: On June 26 , 1913 , Governor Edward F. Dunne , seated , of Illinois signed the Suffrage Bill that gave Illinois women the right to vote .
On June 26 , 1913 , Governor Edward F. Dunne , seated , of Illinois signed the Suffrage Bill that gave Illinois women the right to vote .
Governor Dunne signed the bill in the presence of Grace Wilbur Trout and union labor leader Margaret Healy , also seated .
